title: (Consequential Provisions) Act (No. 23 of 2020)) of the International Protection
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the International Protection Act
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the International Protection Act 

2015 (Section 51B) (Places of Detention) Regulations 2020. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 1 January 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited international protection act 2015 (section 51b) (places detention) regulation 2020 (2) regulation shall come operation 1 january 2021

title: (Consequential Provisions) Act (No. 23 of 2020)) of the International Protection
heading: 2. Each place specified in the Schedule is a place prescribed for the
text_raw:
2. Each place specified in the Schedule is a place prescribed for the 
purposes of section 51B (inserted by section 121 of the Withdrawal of the United 
Kingdom from the European Union (Consequential Provisions) Act (No. 23 of 
2020)) of the International Protection Act 2015 (No. 66 of 2015). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 8th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [727] 3

title: (Consequential Provisions) Act (No. 23 of 2020)) of the International Protection
heading: Every Garda Síochána station
text_raw:
SCHEDULE

title: (Consequential Provisions) Act (No. 23 of 2020)) of the International Protection
heading: (This is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations prescribe the places of detention for the purposes of section 
51B of the International Protection Act 2015. Section 51B was inserted by the 
Withdrawal of the United Kingdom from the European Union (Consequential 
Provisions) Act 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [727]
